AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: ChildExtensionSponsorshipOpportunity Child Add Form (Wrapped)
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: An add form for adding a child as a Child with ChildExtensions (Wrapped)
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

common:Constraint.Name: CK_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD_VALIDGENDERCODE
common:Constraint.common:CustomErrorMsg: Program requirements and child information do not match for 'Gender'.

common:Constraint.Name: CK_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD_VALIDHIVPOSTIVECODE
common:Constraint.common:CustomErrorMsg: Program requirements and child information do not match for 'HIV positive'.

common:Constraint.Name: CK_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD_VALIDISORPHANEDCODE
common:Constraint.common:CustomErrorMsg: Program requirements and child information do not match for 'Orphan'.

common:Constraint.Name: CK_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD_VALIDCONDITIONCODE
common:Constraint.common:CustomErrorMsg: Program requirements and child information do not match for 'Disability/Illness'.

common:Constraint.Name: CK_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY_VALID_LOCATION
common:Constraint.common:CustomErrorMsg: The selected location must fall within the program's location.

common:Exception.common:CustomErrorMsg: The child is too old for the selected group.
Birthdate cannot be in the future.

common:FormField.Caption: My favorite thing to do when I am by myself is
When I play with my friends we
When at home I help out by
When I talk to God I ask Him
When I am at school I like...
Describes the child's personality or qualities that make them unique or special as well as how they interact with and relate to other children
Describes the child's current health including any special concerns or conditions
Describes the child's current level of faith, spiritual understanding and Christian activities
